title: Dapr Graduates CNCF and Connects to WebAssembly
author: B Cameron Gain
description: The Microsoft-led Dapr project has achieved several significant milestones, including its graduation from CNCF and its growing use of WebAssembly.
cntitle: Dapr 从 CNCF 毕业并连接到 WebAssembly
cndescription: 由微软领导的 Dapr 项目已经取得了几个重要的里程碑，包括从 CNCF 毕业以及越来越多地使用 WebAssembly。
